Posts.EditableText: Some of you people know my account (Awesomeman1004) is some- what shut down so I decided to release a final game. (maybe a final game) So I have decided to go on a full out freaking open world like Horror game called the Big warehouse here's the desc!~ You are just an average Joe. You are not a fighter you are a runner. You must flee form enemies in order to survive but if you have the tools you may fight back....... This is not your ordinary horror story. Plot: Your an average Joe who just happened to shop on a very fateful day at the "BIG" warehouse. This is possibly the biggest warehouse built to date. it has 5 miles going in all directions the walls are cut up into "sectors" 4 in total. One day as the store was closing you were knocked out.... Then you wake up in a security room in the middle of the 5 mile warehouse. What will happen now? This is the big warehouse. Features: A health gauge A sanity gauge (just like in a video game) See how it sounds like! I'm realeasing a beta test soon to see if it's a good game. Email me if your intrested. Legendwaffles@Gmail.com
Posts.HTML:
Some of you people know my account (Awesomeman1004) is some- what shut down so I decided to release a final game. (maybe a final game)
So I have decided to go on a full out freaking open world like Horror game called the Big warehouse here's the desc!~

You are just an average Joe. You are not a fighter you are a runner. You must flee form enemies in order to survive but if you have the tools you may fight back....... This is not your ordinary horror story.

Plot:
Your an average Joe who just happened to shop on a very fateful day at the "BIG" warehouse. This is possibly the biggest warehouse built to date. it has 5 miles going in all directions the walls are cut up into "sectors" 4 in total. One day as the store was closing you were knocked out.... Then you wake up in a security room in the middle of the 5 mile warehouse. What will happen now? This is the big warehouse.

Features:
A health gauge
A sanity gauge
(just like in a video game)

See how it sounds like! I'm realeasing a beta test soon to see if it's a good game. Email me if your intrested. Legendwaffles@Gmail.com
